comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 29, 2011, erobey suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 87807061@N05
comment._content: OMG!!!  This was a great picture to see.  I currently live on this block.  Although the school dosent look like that now because of renovations, I still remember it like it was yesterday.  My principal was mr Gottfryand he use to walk up and down the block and speak to everyone.   Wow!! memories.

comment.author: 101530780@N04
comment._content: I went to this  school from 1965 to 1970.This is a very rare picture of the school.
